summaryHighlights.title: Your Impact
summaryHighlights.body: You helped 3 people move toward their goals this month.

summaryHighlights.title: Your Helpfulness Score
summaryHighlights.body: Top 10% of helpers on The Trusted List.

askForHelpCard.title: Need some help today?
askForHelpCard.subtitle: Ask your trusted circle for advice, introductions, or support.

batches.name: Jen Morris
batches.subtitle: Product marketing at Strove
batches.request: My résumé feels disjointed after three different roles in product marketing. Could you do a thorough pass, suggest stronger accomplishment language, and highlight which sections to shrink?

batches.name: Marcus Lee
batches.subtitle: Product lead at Northwind
batches.request: I'm assembling the promotion packet for Director and the narrative feels flat. Would you read the whole draft, flag any missing proof points, and help me craft a tighter summary statement?

batches.name: Anika Chang
batches.subtitle: Design lead, mentor last fall
batches.request: I have a compensation conversation next week and need to run through the script end-to-end, including objections. Can you play the manager role and help me refine the phrasing and pacing?

batches.name: Devon Paul
batches.subtitle: Neighbor, volunteered last month
batches.request: My volunteer org's website relaunch is stuck because the hero copy and call-to-action read generic. Could you skim the new layout and give me 2-3 sharper lines that capture the mission?

network.title: People in your circle who could use support

batches.name: Monica Patel
batches.request: Bryan said you're great at sharpening design narratives. My portfolio feels scattered—can you highlight which case studies to lean into and how to frame the through-line?

batches.name: Leo Ortiz
batches.request: Priya mentioned you know fintech recruiters well. I have three warm intros queued—could you help me script how to position my wins and what pitfalls to avoid?

batches.name: Marisol Andrews
batches.request: Our guild said you're a sharp reviewer. I’m pitching a boutique design agency next week—can you scan the deck and call out any weak narrative or missing proof?

batches.name: Delia Roberts
batches.request: Serena said you keep a story bank on trust. I'm keynoting a leadership offsite and need 2-3 vivid anecdotes—could we chat about the ones that land best?

batches.name: Nico Alvarez
batches.request: Omar said you're gifted at tightening product narratives. My team's new vision doc is too tactical—could you help me zoom it out and make the stakes clearer?

batches.name: Yuan Chen
batches.request: Our alumni board said you reviewed their portfolios. I’m blending clinical research with service design—could you help me articulate the through-line so it resonates with product leaders?

batches.name: Caleb Walters
batches.request: Marcus said you’ve coached nonprofit board candidates. I have a panel on Friday and need to rehearse the scenario questions—could you run a mock session with me?

opportunities.title: People you could help in the wider community

batches.name: Avery Chen
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: UX, wireframing, product thinking
batches.request: I'm prepping for onsite interviews and need someone who speaks the same UX language to run mock sessions. Could you help me refine my story arcs and answer follow-ups?

batches.name: Noah Rivera
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: discovery workshops, prioritization
batches.request: I struggle to describe my wins in a way that sounds strategic. Could you help translate my feature launches into customer/problem framing before my next round?

batches.name: Simone Patel
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: storytelling, stakeholder management
batches.request: I’m transitioning from agency to product and need a partner for mock portfolio presentations. Could you critique how I navigate the slides and handle cross-functional questions?

batches.name: Jordan Ellis
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: lifecycle strategy, experimentation
batches.request: I’m designing a lifecycle experiment for a SaaS onboarding and would love your critique on the flows, success metrics, and copy. Could we do a 30-minute async review?

batches.name: Maya Sterling
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: storytelling, fundraising decks
batches.request: I’m pitching an accelerator and the deck lacks punch. Could you help me rewrite the problem/opportunity slides so they land with the same urgency as your product narratives?

batches.name: Darius Cole
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: inclusive research
batches.request: I'm running an inclusion workshop for a civic tech team. Could you scan the flow to ensure the prompts and exercises land with diverse audiences?

batches.name: Lena Brooks
batches.connectionReason: You share similar skills: portfolio strategy
batches.request: I’m rebuilding my portfolio and unsure how to structure two complicated case studies. Could you help me outline the narrative so they read like decision-making stories?
